content: these mittens are super easy to crochet you can adjust the length as needed yarn size 4 worsted weight makes it possible to get an unsurpassed texture and is quick to crochet just a few hours and warm mittens are ready if frost catches you by surprise also the moss stitch stretches a little which is a great feature of the pattern if you re crocheting mittens as a gift and don t know the exact size a great idea for a last-minute gift stitches used slip_stitch chain single_crochet double_crochet picot materials 1 cake of cascata color 04 crochet hook 6 mm / us j-10 scissors stitch markers tape measure yarn quality cascata hobbii 61 % cotton 39 % acrylic 200 g / 7 1 oz = 400 m / 437 yds
